# this is the build file for project CloudMeeting
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(CloudMeeting LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID})

# target
add_executable(CloudMeeting "")
set_target_properties(CloudMeeting PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "CloudMeeting")
set_target_properties(CloudMeeting PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
add_custom_command(OUTPUT output_CloudMeeting_5c6a4468cc1168d0
    COMMAND echo [  0%]: compiling.qt.ui ui/mainwindow.ui
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/CloudMeeting/windows/x64/release/rules/qt/ui
    COMMAND D:/QT/6.9.3/msvc2022_64/bin/uic.exe ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ui/mainwindow.ui -o ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.gens/CloudMeeting/windows/x64/release/rules/qt/ui/ui_mainwindow.h
    VERBATIM
)
add_custom_target(target_CloudMeeting_5c6a4468cc1168d0
    DEPENDS output_CloudMeeting_5c6a4468cc1168d0
)
add_dependencies(CloudMeeting target_CloudMeeting_5c6a4468cc1168d0)
target_include_directories(CloudMeeting PRIVATE
    include
    build/.gens/CloudMeeting/windows/x64/release/rules/qt/ui
)
target_include_directories(CloudMeeting SYSTEM PRIVATE

    D:/QT/6.9.3/msvc2022_64/include/QtGui/6.9.3

    D:/QT/6.9.3/msvc2022_64/include/QtQml/6.9.3/QtQml
    D:/QT/6.9.3/msvc2022_64/include/QtCore

)
target_compile_definitions(CloudMeeting PRIVATE
    AV_DLL
    QT_NO_DEBUG
    QT_DEPRECATED_WARNINGS
    QT_GUI_LIB
    QT_QUICK_LIB
    QT_QML_LIB
    QT_CORE_LIB
    QT_NETWORK_LIB
)
target_compile_options(CloudMeeting PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Zc:__cplusplus>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/permissive->
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(CloudMeeting PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
    target_compile_options(CloudMeeting PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(CloudMeeting PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
    target_compile_options(CloudMeeting PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(CloudMeeting PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(CloudMeeting PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(CloudMeeting PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(CloudMeeting PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
else()
    target_compile_options(CloudMeeting PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET CloudMeeting PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDLL")
endif()

)
